description: A cozy, dimly lit chamber with stone walls and a vaulted ceiling. The air is musty, and the scent of old parchment fills the space.

table.description: A wooden table with intricate carvings of leaves and vines. It appears to be made of a rich, dark wood.

actions.description: You examine the table more closely and notice that it has a small, hidden compartment in one of its legs.

bookshelf.description: A tall, narrow bookcase made of polished wooden planks. It is filled with tomes bound in leather and adorned with intricate gold filigree.

actions.description: You push the bookshelf open, revealing a hidden compartment containing a rolled-up parchment with a cryptic message.

window.description: A small, narrow window with panes of stained glass depicting scenes from mythology.

actions.description: You push the window open, allowing a faint breeze to enter the room and carry with it the scent of blooming flowers.

door.description: A sturdy wooden door with iron hinges and a heavy-looking iron knocker in the shape of a lion's head.

actions.description: You turn the handle and push the door open, revealing a dark and foreboding hallway beyond.
